code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Registration=()=>{const[formData,setFormData]=useState({idNumber:'',phoneNumber:'',firstName:'',lastName:''});const handleChange=e=>{setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.post('/api/register',formData);console.log('User registered:',response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error registering user:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"registration-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["ID Number:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"idNumber",value:formData.idNumber,onChange:handleChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Phone Number:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"phoneNumber",value:formData.phoneNumber,onChange:handleChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["First Name:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"firstName",value:formData.firstName,onChange:handleChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Last Name:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"lastName",value:formData.lastName,onChange:handleChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Register"})]});};export default Registration;
